page.title: 07LEISURE
page.content: The people of this area have many different leisure activities. As it is a country area there is a {Young Farmers'Club. There is a {Social Club}at Drakelow power station which is very popular. Several local {Angling}clubs have their own stretches of the river. In the village there is a{Football club,an{Athletics}club and a{Youth club as well as groups of{Scouts,Cubs and{Brownies.}There is a{Playgroup,}a {Womens'Institute}and an{Over Sixties'} club. There are also{Hobbies}such as gardening,photography,painting,handi- crafts,model-making,wine and beer making,cookery,reading,collecting, music,drama and outdoor activities such as cycling and hiking.
